title: Chomp SMS 5.94 Donate with iOS Green Theme
description:
chompSMS Donate v5.94
Requirements: Android 2.1+
Overview: Give chompSMS a try. It's a souped-up replacement to the built-in Messaging application, just with a heap more features and customizations.


Give chompSMS a try. It's a souped-up replacement to the built-in Messaging application, just with a heap more features and it's super FAST.

*** 8 million downloads! BIG thanks ****
Frustrated with the built-in Messaging app? Wish it was FASTER with lots more PERSONALIZATION options? Then chompSMS is for you, with lots of extra features like Quick Reply, Quick Compose, Schedule Future Messages, Passcode Lock, Privacy, Emoji Icons, Pre-Defined Text Snippets, Signatures, heaps of customization options (notifications, ringtones, colors, fonts, wallpapers), Blacklisting and much more!
It's completely free and most features are accessible for FREE! It's nice and simple. We do however after 7 days display a small ad banner, this contributes to the ongoing development of chompSMS. But don't worry if you like chompSMS you can purchase a license and we won't show you ads anymore.
PLUS...chompSMS is really FAST!

What's New
* More MMS Improvements.
* Bunch of bug and force close fixes.
For previous history see http://chompsms.com/changelog

This app has NO advertisements

More Info:
 <a href="
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.p1.chompsms" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.p1.chompsms</a>


1) Install/Replace Chomp SMS 5.94
2) Copy ios_green_theme.zip to chomp/themes
3) Go to Setting -> Customize Look -> Themes & Select iOS Green Theme
4) Install chomp SMS emoji add-ons
5) Enjoy iOS Green Bubbles in Your Android ;-) 


iOS Theme Screenshot: http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/800x600q90/822/hmve.jpg
